title: Pho
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Vietnamese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A family-run informal restaurant with four locations in London and one in Brighton. Pho is the national dish of Vietnam and is their specialty. The menu is full of traditional authentically made freshly prepared noodle dishes, soup, salads and curries - all the veggie options are vegan as they don't use any dairy or egg. The desserts are the only thing not made in-house and are not all vegan. They serve alcohol and freshly squeezed juices.
streetAddress: Westfield Shopping Centre, The Balcony, Shepherds Bush
